title: 90% of all people who use the mastery emote in game be like:

replies.body:
I hope you have a nice day.
https://img.gifamerica.com/1e59e80b8b4c4ea6ac4759faabab3457_you-mad-gif-u-mad-bro_400-400.gif
Is it 2008 again?
Na, he's just 9 years younger than you.

If being young again means I can keep a sense of humor then sign me up for High school again.

I eat salt induced downvotes like Smarties. If you can't take a joke I heard the Gameplay board has room for more.

You'll fit right in.

Also, i feel like High School is too mature for you comedy level.

######Might I recommend Pre-School?

Yeah I agree

This is clear discrimination against kekistanis
its just that trollfaces are pretty boring, you probably missed it but there was a time where that was the default joke. and those jokes get real old real fast.
It's 2017, which makes it a whole new year to troll people who don't get jokes.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Galvatron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uAExcMq0,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-04-16T17:13:59.966+0000)
>
> It's 2017, which makes it a whole new year to troll people who don't get jokes.

idk if you get it but
people are not downvoting you because they do not have sence of humor its because you are using unfunny  memes from 2008
https://v.cdn.vine.co/r/avatars/A82DE17E7A1150296484382670848_253b0d26b5e.5.1.jpg?versionId=7zXE2f43O6stBsgHuuXKR0DkUp2g0fB3

I'm not going to explain what I'm doing until the post gets off the front page.

For now I'm just playing the waiting game.

So wait.

You have some secret diabolical plan?

By the time this is off the front page, it wont matter.

It's part of a bet I made with one of my friends who is a Psych major at the school I go to and who also plays this game.

At this point I won the bet but I want to keep it going and see what happens.
This is the typical dumb shit you see from liberal arts majors.
Every day in M&G.
Wow, did you get that meme from reddit or myspace?
Friendster actually.
I don't even know what that is...
I'm 17... and I know what that is, how young ARE you?
{{champion:202}}
So... is that 4?  Or the more perfect 4 x 4, i.e. 16?

{{champion:13}} "NO, I am four hundred and fourty four eons old! I've heard civilizations go quiet"
(you got baited m8)
Excuse me, that is only 3 fours, that is unacceptable, it should be four _thousand_ four hundred and forty four eons!

Record-keeper here.
You edited your post.
Have a nice day. :^)

Where were you the first 2 times I edited my post?

I need to re-evaluate the efficiency of the workers in my company.
I actually think that majority of players just spam mastery icon for some form of self irony after they make a mistake

This. Basically the only times I ever use my 170,000 mastery point Sona icon is either if I totally destroy a teamfight, or if I die like a punk. 

I also use it when I 1v1 someone cause then it's funny that they got beaten by a support.

I pretty much never remember to use it either.  I really only use it these days if I manage to do madlife hook prediction shit because that always feels great.

I used to use it a lot more on Taric but that was when he only had one joke and it made it way more amusing to spam.

I know I do...
I never remember to hit it after I do something right.
I really hate that it's even a thing... I wish I could just mute mastery displays.
That's pretty much me.

Pretty much. I generally use it for two reasons:
 - to brag after a big outplay
 - to laugh after a huge misplay/when I'm dead in the middle of the enemy team
I only flash it after the third (and every single one after that) gank on a lane.  Tilts so hard.

My favorite is when you're farming top peacefully, your jungle comes in, engages a fellow farmer, dies almost instantly, then flashes mastery 7.

{{champion:64}}
{{champion:254}}
No, that's Mastery 6.
I get a laugh every time someone flashes mastery 7 just a second before they die

_flash Mastery_

"Just so you know, before I die, I'M BADASS!!"

_ded_
Bad{{champion:22}} **

It is better with a fail play. I was played np top and the enemy {{champion:64}}  missed his q, then ward hopped, flashed, and then ultied me under my tower to safety. They then showed thier lvl 7 mastery. Great moment.

The best part is when they do it after they die.

Priceless.
That's not fair. Yasuo may go 0/13/0 by 16 minutes but he'll at least have way better CS than that. Come on now.

Not if he began E, sent out Windwall as soon as he hit lvl2, then dashed over his enemy laner and over his windwall into the turret.

Rinse and repeat without him ever touching a minion on purpose. 



_looks back in diary_
_scribbles down the exact words I used_
_changes 'i' to 'he'_
Spamming mastery emote, while running wildly is best part about playing nunu.
My faverouite is when the entire team flashes mastery while sieging mid inhib turret. Then we die and throw the game .

Nah I use mastery emote out of irony when i mess up! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Ah that's always the most fun time to do it.

I just got my teammate and myself killed as Lee flash-kicking a terrible target into them?  Time to spam that mastery emote.  I just suicided 1v9 as Vayne?  You better believe that mastery emote is coming out.
Pshhh...I don't even know what the command is so I couldn't do it for ANY reason. lol
CTRL + 6 is the Mastery Emote command for future reference
Bind it to z for spam
Bind it to right click for the ultimate BM
